entries.headline: Gemini reality check
entries.blurb: Aligned the Gemini registry with reality to reflect the actual model. Even AI needs to check the map sometimes.

entries.headline: The garden has ears
entries.blurb: Whisper Large V3 is now live, turning your spoken words into text faster than a gossip bee.

entries.headline: Drop the beat
entries.blurb: Added 'elevenmusic' for generating AI tunes with custom durations. The hive is officially jamming.

entries.headline: Voice lessons for bots
entries.blurb: Upgraded our text-to-speech engine to ElevenLabs v3. Expect more emotion and significantly less 'beep boop'.

entries.headline: Prepping for Summer of Code
entries.blurb: Tilling the soil for Google Summer of Code with new mentor assignments. Getting ready for the next batch of seedlings.

entries.headline: Polly wants a pull request
entries.blurb: Released Polly, our new Discord bot that bridges community chatter directly with GitHub development.

entries.headline: Frontend fresh coat
entries.blurb: A slick redesign is live with a new user menu, audio model support, and a theme bar that shines.

entries.headline: Audio permissions granted
entries.blurb: Updated the bouncer listâ€”API keys now support granular access control for all our new audio gadgets.

entries.headline: Listing the orchestra
entries.blurb: Added a dedicated endpoint to list audio models. Developers can now programmatically browse the instruments.

entries.headline: Login in style
entries.blurb: The authorization page received a visual overhaul to match the dashboard, plus better balance breakdowns in the API.

entries.headline: Polishing the lenses
entries.blurb: Optimized Flux, Sana, and Twinflow models for stability. Less waiting, more blooming.

entries.headline: Simplified accounting
entries.blurb: The balance API now returns a single, clear number. Because nobody likes doing math on the fly.

entries.headline: No more squishing
entries.blurb: Fixed a bug in Klein-9B that forced non-square images into boxes. Your panoramas are safe again.
